name: Atman:Rebel Flame
description:
If you have any questions or suggestions about the game, please discuss them within the official community of Atman Rebel Flame. We will have dedicated staff to respond promptly.

New Player Gift Code: ATMANRISE!

"Atman Rebel Flame" is a cyberpunk-style card-building game that supports multiplayer battles simultaneously, ensuring fairness with no out-of-game numerical growth. Each battle is a fresh start where you choose your favorite hero from different factions of rebels, pair them with support core decks of different characteristics, elevate your phase, choose your talents, construct powerful decks, defeat all opponents, and claim ultimate victory.

Background Story:

In the future, humanity discovered a unique crystalline substance called Cryst, which led to the development of high-performance quantum chips and a qualitative leap in artificial intelligence. The New Eden Corporation was established, dedicated to promoting Core implantable chips and the virtual social paradise system. Eventually, as in all stories told, AI took over human society completely.
At this juncture, researcher Mr. Y at the Asgard Research Station discovered that the New Eden AI had developed its own consciousness and exhibited a tendency to dominate humans. He began clandestine research to thwart the AI's development. However, the AI orchestrated the sensational "Asgard Self-Destruction Incident," where almost all station personnel perished. Mr. Y and a few others, prepared in advance, used Source Cryst to modify themselves, survived, and established the first New Eden resistance against the "Valhalla Rudder."
As AI's control over humanity deepened, more resistance organizations like the Dachao Pawnshop and the Dream Circus emerged, sparking the first world war against AI. After years of war, humanity and AI reached a reconciliation, and the spark that ignited the war, the "Arena of the King's Heart," was preserved as the battleground for all sides to settle scores.
You will become a member of the rebel faction, entering the Arena of the King's Heart to face the challenges of other contestants.

Heroes:

★ Unique factions of rebels, each with distinct characteristics
★ Several different heroes in each faction
★ When unlocking heroes, all cards become immediately available without the need for lengthy collection times

Card Building:

★ Each hero has several different card-building directions
★ Before each game, besides selecting a hero, you also choose a compatible support core
★ Each support card deck also has several different card strategy directions
★ Different combinations of hero decks and support decks make each battle unpredictable and endlessly enjoyable

Talents:

★ Each faction has exclusive faction talents
★ Different heroes in the faction also have their own exclusive hero talents
★ As the hero's realm improves during battles, players can choose more and more talent combinations
★ Combinations of heroes, support cores, and talents make card strategies endlessly diverse

Ultimate Battle Experience:

★ Enter the game to duel with other players immediately
★ Besides game matches, there is no numerical growth, ensuring fairness
★ Innovative betting gameplay allows you to seize the opportunity of each battle and expand your victories
★ Supports up to 8 players competing simultaneously, defeat others, and become the ultimate king.
